item.name: Active User Count
item.description: Shows the number of unique users that have shown some activity in the last 2 minutes.

item.name: Connection Count
item.description: Shows the total number of client connections maintained.

item.name: RPC Averaged Latency
item.description: Shows the latency, in milliseconds (ms), averaged for the past 1,024 packets.

item.name: RPC Operations/sec
item.description: Shows the rate at which RPC operations occur, per second.

item.name: RPC Requests
item.description: Shows the number of client requests currently being processed by the RPC Client Access service.

item.name: Service Status Microsoft Exchange Search Host Controller
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Active Directory Topology
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Anti-spam update
Service Status Microsoft Exchange DAG Management
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Transport Delivery
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Search Indexer
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Frontend Transport
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Health Manager
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Information Store
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Mailbox Assistants
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Mailbox Replication
Service Status Microsoft Exchange RPC Client Access
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Service Host
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Transport Submission
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Transport Log Search
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Unified Messaging
Service Status Microsoft Exchange Unified Messaging Call Router
User Count
item.description: Shows the number of users connected to the service.

item_prototype.name: RPC Average Latency in Database: {#WMIINDEX0}
item_prototype.description: RPC Latency average (msec) is the average latency in milliseconds of RPC requests per database. Average is calculated over all RPCs since exrpc32 was loaded.

item_prototype.name: RPC Operations/sec in Database: {#WMIINDEX0}
item_prototype.description: Shows the number of RPC operations per second for each database instance.

item_prototype.name: RPC Requests in Database: {#WMIINDEX0}
item_prototype.description: Indicates the overall RPC requests currently executing within the information store process.

trigger_prototype.name: RPC Average Latency in Database: {#WMIINDEX0} is High
RPC Requests in Database: {#WMIINDEX0} is High

trigger.name: IMAP service is down on {HOST.NAME}
Microsoft Exchange Active Directory Topology Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange IMAP4 Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange Information Store Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange Mailbox Assistants Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange Mailbox Replication Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange POP3 Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange Replication Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange RPC Client Access Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange Search Indexer Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange Service Host Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange Throttling Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange Transport Log Search Service Stopped
Microsoft Exchange Transport Service Stopped
OWA HTTPS is down on {HOST.NAME}
POP3 service is down on {HOST.NAME}
RPC Averaged Latency is High
RPC Requests is High
SMTP service is down on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template WMI Microsoft Exchange Server 2013:web.test.rspcode[Exchange Client Access Server Health,ActiveSync].last(0)}<>200
trigger.name: Проверка сервисa Exchange CAS ActiveSync завершилась ошибкой

trigger.expression: {Template WMI Microsoft Exchange Server 2013:web.test.rspcode[Exchange Client Access Server Health,EWS].last(0)}<>200
trigger.name: Проверка сервисa Exchange CAS EWS завершилась ошибкой

trigger.expression: {Template WMI Microsoft Exchange Server 2013:web.test.rspcode[Exchange Client Access Server Health,OWA].last(0)}<>200
trigger.name: Проверка сервисa Exchange CAS OWA​ завершилась ошибкой

trigger.expression: {Template WMI Microsoft Exchange Server 2013:web.test.fail[Exchange Client Access Server Health].last(0)}>0
trigger.name: Проверка сервисов Exchange CAS​ завершилась ошибкой
